DOC.brief_title: Increased Rate Prophylaxis Against Venous Thromboembolism Due eAlerts
DOC.detailed_description: An eAlert displayed electronic patient chart prophylaxis order within 6 h admission transfer . The eAlerts provide evidence-based guideline venous thromboembolism prophylaxis . Now , cluster randomize controlled trial , eAlerts roll evaluated hospital-widely .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : inpatient hospitalize ward computerized physician order entry ( CPOE ) , stay least 24 h ward Exclusion criterion : outpatient , ward without CPOE , patient transfer intervention control ward vice versa
